definition: (genetics) an organism that possesses a recessive gene whose effect is masked by a dominant allele
details:
noun
- (genetics) an organism that possesses a recessive gene whose effect is masked by a dominant allele
- a large warship that carries planes and has a long flat deck for takeoffs and landings
= synonyms: aircraft carrier
- a rack attached to a vehicle
- a self-propelled wheeled vehicle designed specifically to carry something
= example: a self-propelled wheeled vehicle designed specifically to carry something
- a person or firm in the business of transporting people or goods or messages
= synonyms: common carrier
- (medicine) a person (or animal) who has some pathogen to which he is immune but who can pass it on to others
= synonyms: immune carrier
- a boy who delivers newspapers
= synonyms: newsboy
- someone whose employment involves carrying something
= example: someone whose employment involves carrying something
= synonyms: bearer, toter
- a man who delivers the mail
= synonyms: mailman, postman, mail carrier, letter carrier
- a radio wave that can be modulated in order to transmit a signal
= synonyms: carrier wave
- an inactive substance that is a vehicle for a radioactive tracer of the same substance and that assists in its recovery after some chemical reaction
